definition: What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

definition: to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
good people are at peace with themselves, (but) there is no rest for the wicked

definition: to return good for evil (idiom)/to requite evil with good
restrain yourself and return to the rites (idiom, from Analects); to subdue self and observe proprieties/(any number of possible translations)
to be lenient with others (idiom)
a maxim/one's principles
to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else
Confucius says:
way of life/attitude/modus operandi
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to see profit and remember morality (idiom); to act ethically/not tempted by riches
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
Help others, and others may help you (idiom).

definition: Mencius (c. 372-c. 289 BC), Confucian philosopher second only to Confucius/book of the same name, one of the classics of Confucianism
those who understand others are clever, but those who know themselves are truly wise (idiom, from Laozi's 道德經|道德经[Dao4 de2 jing1]
